body:
Comment 3 by **mebibou**: 
So I am running under Mac OS 10.5.8

I took the last version of gcc in the subversion directory, so it would be 4.4.2 I think
(how could I be sure ?).

And I just did /configure --enable-languages=c,c++,go but I put the gmp and mpfr folders
into gcc folder, 
because it wouldn't work otherwise (I previously installed gmp and mpfr, but removed
them from /usr/local 
because I had an other error).
